page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: Hobbies pursued by people in the area are varied. These include sporting activities, dressmaking and sewing, wine and beer making, restoring cars, collecting antiques, listening to and making music, gardening, rearing livestock, astronomy, collecting fossils, radio controlled 'planes, going to the theatre, amateur dramatics and watching television. Many people use the{local library}and read for leisure purposes. Some are involved in some form of study group, such as further education and night school classes. One of the more popular groups is the Marple Amateur Dramatic Society, which has its own theatre, the{Carver {Theatre,}in the centre of the town.
